title: Discord, the popular chatting platform, reportedly suffered a data breach in May this year. | #PlugTheBreach
selftext:
Discord, the popular instant messaging platform, reportedly suffered a data breach in May this year. As per reports, it has started notifying 7 lakh+ users who were affected by the breach, roughly 3 months after the alleged breach.

[https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/mvas-apps/discord-starts-notifying-users-affected-by-march-data-breach/103088430](https://telecom.economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/mvas-apps/discord-starts-notifying-users-affected-by-march-data-breach/103088430)

In case you are a Discord user and have been notified about the breach, please reach out to us at ðŸ“·[info@internetfreedom.in](mailto:info@internetfreedom.in) This effort is part of our #PlugTheBreach initiative, which is a public database that tracks data breaches in the country. [https://plugthebreach.in](https://plugthebreach.in/)
